# Gain insight into business performance to help your team **scale with
confidence.**

LineLeader offers four core products: digital registration software, full-
feature CRM software, a combined family app  
and center management system, along with the Unified platform, which provides
**comprehensive visibility** into every  
contact throughout various stages of their enrollment journey.

So, while **each tool is powerful on its own** , they truly innovate when used
together.

Analyze the ROI

See It In Action

## Just **one bad experience** can drive families and staff away for good.

  
More than half of consumers say they'll stop using a brand after just one bad
experience. Give families and staff the experience they expect so you can keep
your families happy, your staff members around, and your business thriving.





## Trusted by more than **0** daily users around the world.

## Get **everything** you need to market, grow, and run your childcare
business.

  
LineLeader’s award-winning, unified childcare platform seamlessly combines
solutions for lead management, family engagement, payment processing, and
childcare management in a single **user-friendly** platform.

Manage leads, automate marketing communications, digitize registration, and
report on performance.

Enroll More

Easily communicate with families and report on daily activities using our
parent engagement app.  

Engage Better

Automate time and attendance, simplify billing and payments, manage staff, and
streamline center operations.

Manage Easily

## **Accomplish more**. Stress less.

There are only so many hours in the day. Get more done by working smarter, not
harder with automation that only LineLeader can offer. And improve lead
conversion, family and staff retention, and operations.

### More  
Time

Add 10 days to every month by **automating manual work** from inquiry to
retention.

Learn More

### Higher Enrollment

Consistently **hit enrollment targets** with lead conversion rates as high as
75%.

Learn More

### Better Retention

Increase family and staff retention with our **mobile engagement app**.

Learn More

### Simple Management

Streamline **childcare operations** , payment processing, and compliance
reporting.

Learn More

## Not all childcare software is **built the same**.

### One  
login  
that gets you everywhere.

Log in once to manage leads, enroll students, engage families, and run your
center. No more juggling multiple products.

### One tool to train all your team members on.

Get one experience from enrollment to family engagement and center management.
No more learning and managing different products.

### One click  
to the information you need.

Get accurate, fast family data in one click. Say goodbye to information that's
hard to find and different from one product to the next.

## See why childcare businesses **recommend** LineLeader.

### 80 Centers

See how Lightbridge Academy **saves 4 days every month** with LineLeader
automation.

How They Use It

### 85 Centers

See how New Horizons Academy **increased lead conversion rates to 40%**.

How They Use It

### 23 Centers

See how Yellow Brick Road **increased tour completion rates to 82%**.

How They Use It

### 2 Centers

See how Tiny Treasures used tour confirmations and reminders to **increase
enrollment**.

How They Use It

## **Let's talk about your business needs and how LineLeader can help.**



Get a Demo

Download the 2024 Benchmark Report for tips on scaling your business. →
